answers.answer: my anatomy ultrasound went well. everything measured fine and we found out were having a girl! thinking Britton Marie. or maybe Brittan with an A. but the tech did say there was a cyst in/on the brain so im a little worried. she kept reassuring me that it can be normal to find one as long as there aren't more of them. so i will srely ask my doctor about it at my appointment.i have my 21week doc appointment on monday and ill be sure to update when i get home on that one. im assuming she will just meaure my abdomen and check the babies heart, go over the ultrasound with me.

I had my 23 weeks scan on last saturday and thank God everything is fine... Did glucose screening, thats also normal. He/she is doing fine in there. Couldnt know which one... but no complaints there. I am more than happy as long as baby is fine. Next check up is after 4 weeks. Now that i am bit more relieved, I can start shopping... I didnt buy anything yet. Took 3 online gender prediction tests, the chinese one, old wives tale and something else. All of them said we are having a girl....

I had my 23 weeks scan on last saturday and thank God everything is fine... Did glucose screening, thats also normal. He/she is doing fine in there. Couldnt know which one... but no complaints there. I am more than happy as long as baby is fine. Next check up is after 4 weeks. Now that i am bit more relieved, I can start shopping... I didnt buy anything yet. Took 3 online gender prediction tests, the chinese one, old wives tale and something else. All of them said we are having a girl....

my 21 week appointment was so short. i think i was there for like 10 minutes lol. measured stomach. checked heartbeat. answered some questions and then i made an appointment for december and left. im going to be getting another sonogram at 28weeks because of he cyst they found on Brittan's brain. i hope everythings alright and its gone.

Had my 21 week appt yesterday. Everything ok as always. My bp was below 120/80 and thats great since im always paranoid about having preeclampsia! got the U/s last week, everything is fine and perfect, THANK GOD! and we are having a girl!!!

question: How has everyOne's appt gone this month??I had my 21w appt on Wed and my U/s this morring. Everything is looking good! Yay My B/p on Wed was 142/89 and today it was 123/89, I think having my son come to my Ob appt's isnt a good Idea anymore!! LOL U/s dr. did not take any measurment this appt, it was mostly to check the heart and all that good stuff, He will check his size at my next U/s in 4weeks! Both Dr. Order me to get a ton of work done this week I have to get a EKG, 24hr. protein Check, blood work, and I have to do my 1hr. Glucose test as will (( which ***** cuz I'll have to Redo it again in a few weeks too)) Just hoping they have the Orange drink, as the Fruit punch taste like Butt!! Oh yea, only 8lbs gained so far, which is GREAT. Hoping I can keep it under 20lbs!!AND WE HAVE A NAME!Logan Scott
title: November Check up's and U/s's??
